install.name: ZnCbMembers
install.author: ZnJoomla
install.description: This module will display a wall of your cb members in various settings.For more information and help with the use of this module please visit http://znjoomla.blogspot.com

param.name: count
param.label: Number of Members displayed
param.description: Choose how many members are displayed.

param.name: module_width
param.label: Module Width
param.description: Choose the Module Width in pixels.

param.name: module_height
param.label: Module Height
param.description: Choose the Module Height in pixels.

param.name: width_thumbcb
param.label: Thumbnail Width
param.description: Choose the Thumbnail Width in pixels.

param.name: height_thumbcb
param.label: Thumbnail Height
param.description: Choose the Thumbnail Height in pixels.

param.name: modulefunction
param.label: Module Function
param.description: Select the funtion of the module

param.name: showavataronly
param.label: See users without picture?
param.description: Select if you want to show all the users or only the ones with picture.

param.name: viewname
param.label: Username or Real Name
param.description: Please choose if you want to choose the username or the Real Name of the user after the thumb...

param.name: showimageapr
param.label: Users without Avatar Approved
param.description: Select if you want to show or not users with CB avatar not approved or pending approval

param.name: imagelinked
param.label: Link User Avatar?
param.description: Select if you want the avatar of the user to be linked to him profile

param.name: showgender
param.label: Show users gender in tooltip?
param.description: Please choose if you want to show the users gender in the tooltip.

param.name: gender_field
param.label: Gender field
param.description: Type the name of your gender field from Community builder fields.

param.name: showage
param.label: Show users age in tooltip?
param.description: Please choose if you want to show the users age in the tooltip.

param.name: age_field
param.label: Birthday field
param.description: Type the name of your birthday field from Community builder fields.

param.name: showlocation
param.label: Show users location?
param.description: Please choose if you want to show the users location in tooltip.

param.name: location_field
param.label: Location field
param.description: Type the name of your location field from Community builder fields.
